channel.title: CVE Feed for remix4 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for remix4 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5468|2024-08-02T07:59:44.761Z -- remix4 -- slick%20contact%20forms
item.description: The Slick Contact Forms plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'dcscf-link' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 1.3.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2023-6878|2024-08-02T08:42:08.189Z -- remix4 -- slick%20social%20share%20buttons
item.description: The Slick Social Share Buttons plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'dcssb_ajax_update' function in versions up to, and including, 2.4.11. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level permissions or above to update the site options arbitrarily.

item.title: CVE-2023-4890|2024-08-02T07:38:01.036Z -- remix4 -- jquery%20accordion%20menu%20widget
item.description: The JQuery Accordion Menu Widget for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'dcwp-jquery-accordion' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 3.1.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
